Policy.description: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified vector bucket. In IAM, you must provide policy documents in JSON format. However, in CloudFormation you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format because CloudFormation converts YAML to JSON before submitting it to IAM.
Policy.markdownDescription:
A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified vector bucket. In IAM, you must provide policy documents in JSON format. However, in CloudFormation you can provide the policy in JSON or YAML format because CloudFormation converts YAML to JSON before submitting it to IAM.

---

Required: No  
Type: ['object', 'string']  
Update requires: No interruption

VectorBucketArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vector bucket.
VectorBucketArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the vector bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

VectorBucketName.description: The name of the vector bucket
VectorBucketName.markdownDescription:
The name of the vector bucket

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Update requires: No interruption
